name: terraform-aws
description: Scripts to build and manage AWS infrastructure for Notes and Userauth

scripts.docker-login: aws ecr get-login-password --profile $AWS_PROFILE --region $AWS_REGION | docker login --username AWS --password-stdin $AWS_USER.dkr.ecr.$AWS_REGION.amazonaws.com
scripts.docker-login-windows: aws ecr get-login-password --region %AWS_REGION% | docker login --username AWS --password-stdin %AWS_USER%.dkr.ecr.%AWS_REGION%.amazonaws.com
scripts.build-images: npm run build-image-svc-notes && npm run build-image-svc-userauth
scripts.ecr-create-repos: npm run ecr-create-svc-notes && npm run ecr-create-svc-userauth
scripts.ecr-tag-repos: npm run ecr-tag-svc-notes && npm run ecr-tag-svc-userauth
scripts.ecr-tag-repos-windows: npm run ecr-tag-svc-notes-windows && npm run ecr-tag-svc-userauth-windows
scripts.ecr-push-repos: npm run ecr-push-svc-notes && npm run ecr-push-svc-userauth
scripts.ecr-push-repos-windows: npm run ecr-push-svc-notes-windows && npm run ecr-push-svc-userauth-windows
